refnamediv.refpurpose: Loads parameter banks to a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: vstbankload is used for loading parameter banks to a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: instance - the number which identifies the plugin, to be passed to other vst4cs opcodes.
ipath - the full pathname of the parameter bank (.fxb file).

example.title: Example for vstbankload
